pageTitle: Alfa Romeo in the Targa Florio
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7080=Dates, cars, teams, drivers and results of Alfa Romeo in the Targa Florio (1953 - 1977)., 87278=30th April 1961}
textBeforeTable: Alfa Romeo won the Targa Florio 10 times: The Targa Florio, organised by Vincenzo Florio, was one of the world's earliest motor races and with a few exceptions, the event has always been held on the Piccolo Madonie track around the Madonie Mountain near Palermo in Sicily. The 72 kilometer track runs over mountain roads with 800 curves and corners and one 5 kilometer straight. See all Targa Florio related Alfa Romeo models and more here.
